programme.title: 1988 televised debates, and Thatcher in 1979
programme.short_synopsis: Has the campaign for the 1988 presidential election become too sterile?
programme.medium_synopsis: The polished nature of the Bush/Dukakis debates, the 'American-style' of Margaret Thatcher's public relations in 1979, and Jimmy Carter's negative review of the 1988 campaign.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: 1988 televised debates, and Thatcher in 1979

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
